overview: Orthak is a troubled young orc whose only enjoyment is playing "HumanTown", a fantasy board game about modern human life. By some miracle, he manages to teleport to his dream and witness firsthand - the struggle, beauty and horror of real-life "HumanTown". A city with relatable "human" problems such as: crime, mad scientists and spontaneous head explosions.
title: HumanTown
